SpellDef.Description: +1 Faith per Essence in the enchanted city.
Heals target unit by 8 (+1 per level).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Heals target unit by %d.

SpellDef.Description: Transfers 4 hit points (plus caster's level) from enemy unit to the casting unit. Can be resisted.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hitpoints from enemy unit to the casting unit. Can be resisted.

SpellDef.Description: City doesn't receive an unrest penalty based on the amount of cities in your empire.

GameModifier.Provides: Negates the unrest penalty from the amount of cities in your empire

SpellDef.Description: Undead units in a 1 tile radius are pushed back a tile and, unless they resist, blinded for 2 turns (-25% Accuracy and Dodge).
Undead units in a 1 tile radius lose 4 hit points per caster level and are knocked prone, half damage if resisted.
Undead units in a 1 tile radius are stunned for 1 turn unless they resist.
Take control of the targeted Undead unit unless it resists.
Take control of the targeted Undead unit unless it resists.
Up to 3 adjacent enemies are struck taking divine damage equal to caster level, with a 25% chance to be knocked prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Up to 3 adjacent enemies are struck taking %d divine damage, with a 25%% chance to be knocked prone.

SpellDef.Description: Up to 3 adjacent enemies are struck taking infernal damage equal to caster level, with a 25% chance to be knocked prone.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Up to 3 adjacent enemies are struck taking %d infernal damage, with a 25%% chance to be knocked prone.

SpellDef.Description: Target unit gains +5 Accuracy and Dodge, and +1 divine damage.
Target unit gains +5 Accuracy and Dodge, and +1 divine damage.
Target unit suffers -10 Accuracy and Dodge and loses their next attack, unless they resist.
Target unit has a 50% chance to avoid the effects of Fear, Terror and Tame/Charm.

Target units have a 50% chance to avoid the effects of Fear, Terror and Tame/Charm.
See Tooltip. See WARNINGS.
--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING! Generally, Mass Army Spells do not stack with the Individual or the Mass Faction versions.
Mass Army Spells disable the equivalent Mass Faction Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Mass Faction Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Army Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel ---------------------------------------------------

::: Caster and Targets must be on the same tile

Target units have a 50% chance to avoid the effects of Fear, Terror and Tame/Charm.

--------------------------------------------------- !WARNING!
Mass Spells are memory intensive and may provoke a crash.
Generally, Mass Faction Spells do not stack with Individual or Mass Army versions.
Mass Faction Spells disable equivalent Mass Army Spells (Spellbook). Mass Faction Spells disable equivalent Individual Spells (Spellbook).
IF you want to re-enable a specific Individual or Mass Army Spell, dispel the equivalent Mass Faction Spell: CTRL-K (Govern) > Enchantments > Dispel ---------------------------------------------------

Heals target unit by 18 (+1 per caster level).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Heals target unit by %d.

SpellDef.Description: Target unit heals 3 points per round and additional 3 points per round when under 50% hit points. Unit counts as a Demon and is vulnerable to divine damage.

GameModifier.Provides: Unit counts as Demon
Suffers double damage from Infernal damage

SpellDef.Description: A blast of holy energy strikes the target unit for double the caster's level divine damage (half if resisted). If the target is killed the faction gains +5 Faith.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A blast of holy energy strikes the target unit for %d divine damage (half if resisted). If the target is killed the faction gains +5 Faith.

SpellDef.Description: A blast of unholy energy strikes the target unit for double the caster's level infernal damage (half if resisted). If the target is killed the faction gains +5 Faith.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A blast of unholy energy strikes the target unit for %d infernal damage (half if resisted). If the target is killed the faction gains +5 Faith.

SpellDef.Description: Allied units within a 2 tile radius gain +25% physical damage resistance.
Target unit may act immediately when struck in battle.

GameModifier.Provides: The unit may act immediately when struck in battle

SpellDef.Description: Glorious Sentry Effect
Each time a friendly unit is struck in battle they gain +1 infernal attack.

GameModifier.Provides: +1 infernal attack each time this unit is struck in battle

SpellDef.Description: Infernal Requital Effect
Target enemy cannot move, and takes caster's level damage for 3 rounds unless they resist.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target enemy cannot move, and takes %d damage for 3 rounds unless they resist.

SpellDef.Description: Divine Inferno does 8 (+2 per caster level) divine damage to units within a 1 tile radius.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Divine Inferno does %d divine damage to units within a 1 tile radius.

SpellDef.Description: Malefic Burst inflicts 8 (+2 per caster level) infernal damage to enemy units within a 2 tile radius of the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Malefic Burst inflicts %d infernal damage to enemy units within a 2 tile radius of the caster.

SpellDef.Description: All allied units are healed of half their current damage (+1 per caster level).
Target Champion is healed triple the caster's level health and cured of a random injury.

GameModifier.Provides: Removes a random injury

SpellDef.Description: All members of the targeted army heal 14 hit points (+2 per death shard). Caster is withered (reduced attack) for 3 seasons.
Target enemy Champion suffers a random injury unless resisted.
